name: volume_up_down_mute
description: Check if it's possible to set the volume up, set the volume down or mute the volume.

steps.description: Press the "volume up" button of the laptop
steps.expected: an event with the volume status increasing appears on the screen.

steps.description: Press the "volume down" button of the laptop
steps.expected: an event with the volume status decreasing appears on the screen.

steps.description: Press the "mute" button of the laptop
steps.expected: an event with the volume status muted appears on the screen
an event must appears according to the action which is performed with a coherent sound

name: volume_up_down_mute_short
objective: Volume up, Volume down, Mute using gnome
description: Check if it's possible to set the volume up, set the volume down or mute the volume using the gnome bar.

steps.description: Click on the volume icon on the gnome desktop

steps.expected: volume increase/decrease and when can hear the difference

name: icon-visible
objective: The icon for sound setting is visible
description: Open the panel settings and check that the icon for the sound settings is visible
author: jb

name: panel-displayed
objective: The panel for sound setting is displayed
description:
Open the panel settings and then the sound setting panel. 
Check that the panel opens.
author: jb

name: panel-main
objective: The panel for sound setting has main function working
description:
Open the sound setting panel. 
Check that on/off and volume settings works well.
author: jb

name: panel-tab-output
objective: The panel for sound setting of output is functionnal
description:
Open the sound setting panel on tab "output". 
Check that tab's functionnalities works well.
Check that "test speakers" works.
author: jb

name: panel-tab-input
objective: The panel for sound setting of input is functionnal
description:
Open the sound setting panel on tab "input". 
Check that tab's functionnalities works well.
author: jb

name: panel-tab-sound-effects
objective: The panel for sound setting of sound effects is functionnal
description:
Open the sound setting panel on tab "sound effects". 
Check that tab's functionnalities works well.
author: jb

name: panel-tab-applications
objective: The panel for sound setting of applications is functionnal
description:
Open the sound setting panel on tab "applications". 
Check that tab's functionnalities works well.
author: jb
